Package helper

Class AppointmentsQuery

java.lang.Object
helper.AppointmentsQuery
public abstract class AppointmentsQuery extends Object
Helper abstract class contains functions relating to appointments queries between the Java program and the MySQL database. Lambda Expression: Line 381 - Iterating over a list to reduce verbosity.
